title: Go Package Management Call To Action
description: Nathan Youngman, with the help of others, has produced this document outlining months of research and discovery. I would appreciate everyone to honestly read it before continuing with my post. http://nathany.com/go-packages/ Mitchell Hashimoto also published this post on go-nuts and everyone should read this as well. https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/golang-nuts/BMZDD6FM-QE/LX4JSs4NVLIJ These two documents outline the current capabilities and issues surrounding the Go tooling as it relates to package management. This has been discussed and discussed at length yet we still don't have a consensus on what the community will rally around.
